description: This function is executed when a <%=character%> attempts to move to another <%=tile%>.
The `tile` parameter is the <%=tile%> it is attempting to move to, and the script can query it like normal.
Return `true` if the <%=character%> will be allowed to move to the <%=tile%>.

parameters.name: tile
parameters.desc: The <%=tile%> that the executing <%=character%> is trying to move to.

return_value_desc: `true` if the executing <%=character%> can move onto the <%=tile%>, otherwise `false`.
